column1: Table 3-22:  2020 Adjusted Non-Energy Use Fossil Fuel Consumption, Storage, and Emissions

column2: + Does not exceed 0.05 TBtu, MMT C, or MMT CO2 Eq.
a To avoid double counting, net exports have been deducted.
c Formerly referred to as “Pentanes Plus.” This source has been adjusted and is reported separately from HGL to align with historic data and revised EIA terminology.
Note: Totals may not sum due to independent rounding.
